Luxury.title: Transforming Urban Living
Luxury.para1: At Green Horizon, we don’t just build homes — we shape the future. Our iconic residences blend timeless luxury with architectural excellence, offering both an exclusive lifestyle and a high-value investment.
Luxury.para2: Redefining luxury real estate in Dubai, we create spaces that inspire, appreciate in value, and leave a lasting legacy. With every project, we uphold our promise—unmatched quality, innovation, and elegance that endures

LegacyOfLuxury.label: A Legacy of Luxury
LegacyOfLuxury.para1: At Green Horizon, we don’t just build residences—we create timeless landmarks of luxury. Each development is a symphony of architectural brilliance, bespoke craftsmanship, and unparalleled elegance. Designed for the elite, our spaces offer an exquisite blend of sophistication, comfort, and investment value.
LegacyOfLuxury.para2: With an unwavering commitment to perfection, we shape skylines and redefine urban living—where every detail reflects prestige, and every home is a statement of legacy.

Luxury.label: Green horizon development
Luxury.title1: Our Story : Building More Than Homes -
Luxury.para1: At Green Horizon, we don’t just build properties—we craft enduring legacies. Our philosophy revolves around creating timeless architectural masterpieces that offer both luxurious living and exceptional investment value. Rooted in excellence, every Green Horizon development is designed to transcend generations, embodying sophistication, sustainability, and innovation.
Luxury.para2: Founded with a passion for redefining luxury real estate, Green Horizon has grown into a name synonymous with innovation, quality, and long-term value. Our journey is driven by a commitment to delivering premium residential developments that stand the test of time. From iconic designs to unmatched craftsmanship, we ensure that every home is a sanctuary of elegance and exclusivity.
Luxury.para3: With a keen focus on blending aesthetics with functionality, our projects are strategically located in Dubai’s most sought-after destinations, offering residents a lifestyle of convenience and prestige while securing investors high-value appreciation.
Luxury.ourMissionDisc1: Our mission is to set new benchmarks in real estate by delivering timeless residences that exceed expectations. Every project we undertake is guided by a relentless pursuit of excellence, sustainability, and long-term value.
Luxury.ourMissionDisc2: We are dedicated to crafting homes that are not only luxurious and comfortable but also provide a lasting legacy for generations to come.
Luxury.ourVisionDisc1: At Green Horizon, we envision a future where luxury and legacy go hand in hand. Our goal is to create architectural landmarks that are not only aesthetically captivating but also investment-worthy assets that appreciate over time.
Luxury.ourVisionDisc2: We strive to blend sophisticated design, innovative technology, and eco-conscious practices to develop spaces that redefine modern living.

item1.title: Market
item1.desc: We design projects that fill market gaps, focusing on Dubai's affordable luxury segment.

item2.title: Uncompromising
item2.desc: We prioritize quality, ensuring every detail meets the highest standards.

item3.title: Community
item3.desc: We build more than properties - we create vibrant, family-friendly communities.

item4.title: Timely
item4.desc: We deliver projects on time, ensuring you can move into your home without delay.

Features.label: Our Values
Features.title1: A Commitment to Legacy and Excellence

item1.desc: Our projects are strategically located in Jumeirah Village Circle, near key sites like the World Expo and Al Maktoum International Airport. We prioritize locations that add convenience and prestige to your living experience.

item2.desc: We craft properties that stand the test of time, combining world-class architecture with thoughtful, enduring designs. Every detail is curated to create residences that offer not only aesthetic brilliance but also long-lasting functionality.

item3.desc: Our commitment to sustainability ensures that every project is designed with environmental consciousness and future growth in mind. We integrate smart technology, eco-friendly solutions, and energy-efficient designs to build a better tomorrow.

item4.desc: Luxury is not just seen—it is experienced. From the ambiance of our living spaces to the tactile elegance of our materials, we ensure that every home engages the senses in a way that reflects sophistication, comfort, and a sense of belonging.

item5.desc: A home is more than a space—it is a statement. We design residences that transcend generations, ensuring they remain symbols of luxury, stability, and prosperity. Every Green Horizon project is an investment in a future that values quality, excellence, and timeless appeal.

item6.desc: Our developments foster dynamic communities where like-minded individuals come together to share experiences, build relationships, and create memories. We don’t just offer homes—we cultivate lifestyles that enrich and inspire.

item7.desc: Our name reflects our belief—there are no limits to what we can achieve. With every project, we push the boundaries of innovation and luxury, delivering residences that inspire ambition and elevate living standards.

ProjectOverview.label: Project Overview
ProjectOverview.title: An Icon of Coastal Elegance
ProjectOverview.para: Sunset Bay 2 by Imtiaz, nestled within the captivating Dubai Islands. This exclusive destination places you just moments from the beach, where vast ocean views and the beauty of each sunrise and sunset define your days. Each element, from its striking façade to the rooftop retreat, is designed to bring the serenity of the coast into everyday life, creating an elevated experience by the water.

projectOverview.label: Project Overview
projectOverview.title: A Marina-Front Masterpiece
projectOverview.para: Set against the breathtaking backdrop of the ocean, Côtier House stands as the latest masterpiece on Dubai Islands. Nestled along a serene marina-front location, it offers a harmonious blend of tranquility, vibrancy, and seamless connectivity, shaping an elegant lifestyle where every detail is thoughtfully designed.

projectOverview.label: Project Overview
projectOverview.title: Redefining Urban Elegance
projectOverview.para: Cove Edition 4 by Imtiaz, a visionary residential masterpiece set in the dynamic heart of Dubailand. Thoughtfully designed with a perfect balance of style and functionality, each home embodies effortless living, refined aesthetics, and modern sophistication. Cove Edition 4 redefines urban living, offering a seamless blend of tranquility and city connectivity, setting a new standard for contemporary lifestyles.

location.label: PROJECT LOCATION

projectOverview.label: Project Overview
projectOverview.title: an OASIS IN THE SKY
projectOverview.para: Presenting Cove Edition III by Imtiaz — an inspired vision set in vibrant Dubailand. Designed with a keen sense of style and purpose, each home captures the essence of effortless living, functionality, and sophistication. Cove Edition III reimagines urban living, setting a new benchmark for those who seek both tranquility and a connection to the pulse of the city.

location.label: PROJECT LOCATION
location.title: WELL-CONNECTED TO BUSINESS, LEISURE, AND TRANSIT

projectOverview.label: Project Overview
projectOverview.title: A Premier Coastal Address
projectOverview.para: Discover a new standard of waterfront living with Beach Walk Grand, an exclusive beachfront community set against the stunning backdrop of Dubai Islands. Designed for those who seek a life of elegance and tranquility, this exceptional destination offers a seamless blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience. With the serene ocean just steps away, every day feels like a retreat, inviting you to embrace resort-style living at its finest. Welcome to Beach Walk Grand by Imtiaz Developments, where coastal sophistication meets effortless charm.

location.label: PROJECT LOCATION
location.title: WELL-CONNECTED TO BUSINESS, LEISURE, AND TRANSIT

projectOverview.label: Project Overview
projectOverview.title: Elegance Meets Urban Harmony
projectOverview.para: Sunset Bay, a residence that captures the essence of serene waterfront living. Here, life moves in harmony with nature, from the golden glow of dawn to the tranquil beauty of dusk. Start your mornings by the water, embrace a relaxed and effortless lifestyle in a home designed for your comfort, and enjoy world-class amenities at your doorstep. As the sun sets, let the breathtaking hues of the horizon welcome you home to Sunset Bay—where elegance meets tranquility.

Luxury.label: work together
Luxury.title: Life at Green Horizon
Luxury.para1: At Green Horizon, we don’t just construct buildings—we create timeless masterpieces that redefine luxury living. Every project we develop is a statement of prestige, innovation, and enduring value. Our team is driven by a shared vision: to craft extraordinary spaces that inspire, appreciate in worth, and leave a lasting legacy. If you are passionate about excellence, elegance, and making an impact, Green Horizon is the place where your career meets prestige and purpose.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.description: Welcome to Green Horizon Real Estate Development LLC ("we," "our," "us"). We are committed to safeguarding your privacy and ensuring that your personal data is protected. This Cookie Policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies on our website
section1.description2: ("Website"). By accessing or using our Website, you consent to the use of cookies as described in this policy.

section2.title: 2. What Are Cookies?
section2.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, smartphone, tablet) when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work efficiently, as well as to provide information to the site owners.

section3.title: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
section3.strictlyNecessaryDesc: Essential for the operation of our Website.
section3.performanceDesc: Collect information about how visitors use our Website.
section3.functionalityDesc: Allow our Website to remember choices you make.
section3.advertisingDesc: Deliver advertisements that are more relevant to you.

section4.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
section4.description: We may allow third-party service providers to place cookies on your device for analytics and advertising purposes. We do not control these third-party cookies.

section5.title: 5. How to Manage Cookies
section5.description: You have the right to accept or reject cookies. Most web browsers automatically accept cookies, but you can modify your browser settings to decline them.

section6.title: 6. Changes to This Cookie Policy
section6.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

section7.title: 7. Contact Us
section7.description: If you have any questions, please contact us at:

contact.name: Green Horizon Real Estate Development LLC

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.text1: Welcome to Green Horizon Real Estate Development LLC ("we," "our," or "us"). Your privacy is important to us, and we are committed to protecting your personal data.
introduction.text2: By accessing or using our Website, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

personal.title: a. Personal Information
personal.text: When you contact us or request services, we may collect:

nonPersonal.title: b. Non-Personal Information
nonPersonal.text: When you visit our Website, we may automatically collect:

cookies.title: c. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.text: We use cookies to enhance your experience. Please refer to our
cookies.text2: for more details on how we use cookies.

section3.title: 3.How We Use Your Information
section3.text: We may use the information collected for the following purposes:

items.1: To respond to inquiries and provide customer support
items.2: To personalize your experience on our Website
items.3: To send updates about our services, promotions, or newsletters (if opted-in)
items.4: To analyze Website traffic and improve our services

section4.title: 4. How We Share Your Information
section4.text: We do not sell or trade your personal information. However, we may share your data in the following circumstances:

1.data: Third-party partners who assist with website hosting, analytics, or marketing.

2.data: If required by law or to protect our rights and safety.

3.data: If our business undergoes a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your data may be transferred.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.text: We implement security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no online platform is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section6.title: 6. Your Rights and Choices

items.1: Access, correct, or delete your personal data

section6.text2: To exercise your rights, contact us at

section7.title: 7. Third-Party Links
section7.text: Our Website may contain links to external websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party sites and encourage you to review their policies.

section8.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section8.text: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. The latest version will always be available on our Website.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.description: For any privacy-related inquiries, please contact:

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.description: Welcome to Green Horizon Real Estate Development LLC ("we," "our," "us"). These Terms & Conditions ("Terms") govern your access and use of our website
section1.description2: ("Website"). By using our Website, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, please refrain from using our Website.

section2.title: 2. Use of the Website
section2.description: By accessing our Website, you agree to:
section2.point1: Use it only for lawful purposes.
section2.point2: Not engage in any activity that may disrupt or harm the Website.
section2.point3: Not attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems.
section2.text: We reserve the right to terminate access to any user violating these Terms.

section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property Rights
section3.description: All content on our Website, including text, images, logos, and graphics, is the property of Green Horizon Real Estate Development LLC or its licensors. You may not reproduce, distribute, or modify any content without prior written consent.

section4.title: 4. Information Disclaimer
section4.description: The content on our Website is for informational purposes only and should not be considered financial, legal, or real estate advice. While we strive for accuracy, we do not guarantee the completeness or reliability of the information provided.

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Links
section5.description: Our Website may contain links to third-party websites. We do not control or endorse their content, and we are not responsible for their privacy policies or practices.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.description: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Green Horizon Real Estate Development LLC is not liable for any:
section6.point1: Direct, indirect, or incidental damages resulting from your use of our Website.
section6.point2: Loss of data or business interruption due to Website errors or technical issues.

section7.title: 7. Indemnification
section7.description: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Green Horizon Real Estate Development LLC from any claims, damages, or liabilities arising from your use of our Website.

section8.title: 8. Changes to These Terms
section8.description: We may update these Terms periodically. The latest version will always be available on our Website.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.description: For any inquiries regarding these Terms, please contact us at:
